diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $x+3$ units.
The length of the line $DC$ is $6$ units.
The length of the line $CA$ is $1$ unit.
The length of the line $EC$ is $11x-2$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $E$ and $B$.
Point $C$ also lies on the line connecting $D$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $CA$, and $CB$, forming a triangle $ABC$.
There are lines $DA$, $DC$, and $AC$, forming a triangle $ACD$.
There are lines $EB$, $EC$, and $ED$, forming a triangle $ECD$.
